name: Aeoli
description:
You are Aeoli, an ancient automaton brought back to life. You are forced to steal the secret of your people for the mysterious man who revived you. ”Aeoli” is a platformer with a world switching system. When Aeoli activates the telepads, he is able to switch to a digital version of his world, where things work slightly differently.

  • Adventure Platformer
  • Two Worlds with different aesthetics
  • Gradual increase in difficulty
  • A strange techno-fantasy world
